data.actual_result: You are taken back to server settings.
data.expected_result: You should be taken to the server you were last in/the default discord page.
data.short_description: Clicking "Streamer Mode Enabled" in Server Settings will open user settings on top of server settings.
data.steps_to_repro: - Enable streamer mode. - Find a server that you have permission to "View Audit Log" - Go to the audit log - Click "Streamer Mode Enabled" - Click the "X" in the top right of the window that opened. - Observe -
